assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare that they have no competing interests.

group.label: Ethics approval and consent to participate
group.name: EthicsHeading

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: All individuals gave informed consent before the blood collection. This study was approved by the Nepal Health Research Council, Kathmandu, Nepal and Institutional Ethical Committee of CSIR-Centre for Cellular and Molecular Biology, Hyderabad, India. The relevant protocol was explained to each individual, and an informed consent written in Nepali was got by either signature or fingerprint if the subject could not write.
